combatSkills.name: Dia Orpheus
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Str. & Mag.+80%/3 turns and 50% chance to grant Revive once, which will revive Adventurers at 50% of Max HP

combatSkills.name: Bestow Light
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Fast Fire, Water, Thunder, Earth, Wind, Light, and Dark Resist+20% and 35% HP Regen/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Radiant Grace
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Hi HP Heal and Str. & Mag.+35% and Critical Rate, Penetration Rate, and Heal+30%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Repentance
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Light M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost & Hi Penetration Rate and [Allies] Ailment Cure

passiveSkills.name: Encouragement
passiveSkills.description: When countering, instead of attacking regularly, it (Lo) Heals an Ally. Prioritizes an Ally with lower percentage HP.
